ygData.subject: RE: Hammer of Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: I can t really say about the higher level Hammers. However at level 9 they are great. I play on Rallos Zek which after playing the other servers is much more
ygData.messageBody:
I can't really say about the higher level Hammers. However at level 9 they
are great. I play on Rallos Zek which after playing the other servers is
much more fun, imho.

...but its nice to be able to carry a weapon that cannot be looted.

The downside is last night I forgot to summon it and I took on a undead pawn
gamble. So close but I just could n't finish him off with my Cleric "Fists
of Death" *Silly grin*

Regards

-----Original Message-----
From: Harry Katz [mailto:hkatz@...]
Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 1:16 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Hammer of Stuff


From: Harry Katz <hkatz@...>

well...i cant give you exact info cause im at work...
but, i believe the damage (6) stays the same for the later hammers...
just the delay decreases..
you will find the higher level hammers are quite ineffective.

Dank Skunksage
-the Rathe


At 07:38 PM 7/23/99 -0000, you wrote:
>From: devotion_con@...
>
>Hello, all.
>
>I have been using the Hammer of Wrath since level 9. I have looked all
over the web to find the stats of the later hammers I can summon, but have
been unable to find them. Could somebody let me know the stats for the
other hammers? Thanks. I know they aren't the best in "ratio", but they
will always be my favorite because they are a gift from Rodcet Nife.
>
>Also, while lurking I have noticed a lot of complaints that there aren't
any cleric only weapons in the game. Heh. Who else gets to use the Hammer
of Wrath? :)
>
>Devotion
>Guildmaster - Clerics of Norrath Povar
